explanations.machine learning: The paper uses machine learning techniques (SVM and AR-MRNN) for predicting returns and portfolio selection.
explanations.supervised learning: The prediction of returns is a supervised learning task where models are trained on historical data to predict future returns.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions using SVM for predicting returns and portfolio selection.
explanations.SVM: SVM is used as a predictor in the proposed portfolio selection model.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions AR-MRNN (a type of neural network) as one of the methods used for prediction.
